original_text: Anyone can be safe in these cities if he has killed someone but he did not mean to kill. A person like that must run to one of these towns and he will be safe from the dead person's relative.
korean_text: 부지중에 실수로 사람을 죽인 자를 그리로 도망하게 하라 이는 너희를 위해 피의 보복자를 피할 곳이니라

sentences.original_text: Anyone can be safe in these cities
sentences.korean_translation: 누구든지 이 도시들에서 안전할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: but he did not mean to kill
A person like that must run to one of these towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 사람은 이 도시 중 하나로 달려가야 합니다
